name: Falls and Jumps
description:
Falls and Jumps is an endless and challenging 2D platform game about a little mage fighting for his life from a bottomless abyss.
By jumping on platforms that appear for a short time and avoiding deadly traps, you prolong the game of a nimble hero. Keep track of the time of existence of the platforms and think over the movements in advance so as not to fall down. Your task is to hold out as long as possible.

Game Features:
- Endless gameplay
- Dangerous traps in random places
- No chance to stay in one place
